entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
